update() - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Scenes.Hud
Changes the Color of the displayed TIME according to time left Number of PacMans in HUD change depending on lives left
update(float) - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens.GameScreen
Game over when time hits 0, Level up when all dots are eaten.
update(float) - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens.MapScreen
Checks the state of the game and updates the textures and positions of the sprites.
update(float) - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens.PauseScreen
Checks the position of PacMan for changing settings, returning to or exiting the game.
update(float) - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens.ScoreScreen
Checks the position of PacMan for quitting this screen or resetting all settings.
update(float) - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens.SettingsScreen
Update checks the position of PacMan, so find out if any of the options were chosen by the player.
update() - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens.SplashScreen
displays the the logos and then moves on to displaying the loading pacman icon
update(float) - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Sprites.Actor
Updates the animation of the Actor.
update(float) - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Sprites.Animation
This method adjusts the speed for the animation depending on whose sprite is chosen
update(float, PacMan) - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Sprites.Enemy
This update method checks the current state of the game to determine what each ghost needs to do next.
update(float) - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Sprites.PacMan
Checks if PacMan is dieing right now and moves if he's not.
updateCoolDown() - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens.GameScreen
Updates the timer of the cool-down and checks, if the different time thresholds are reached.
updateHunter() - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens.GameScreen
Updates the timer of the hunting buff and checks if the time is up.
updateLoading() - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens.SplashScreen
Displays the the loading pacman icon in the middle of the screen.
updateSloMo() - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens.GameScreen
Updates the timer of the SloMo buff and checks if the time is up.
updateSplash() - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Screens.SplashScreen
Checks the time, the SplashScreen is shown yet and reacts according to it.
updateTime(float) - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Scenes.Hud
 
UpOrDown(int) - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Sprites.Enemy
Simply detects if PacMan is above or beneath the ghost.
upPressed - Variable in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Scenes.Controller
